Package tools

Source: R/pkg_tools.R
pkg_tools.Rd

These are functions to help you navigate inside your project while developing

pkg_name(path = ".")

pkg_version(path = ".")

pkg_path()

Arguments

path

Path to use to read the DESCRIPTION

Value

The value of the entry in the DESCRIPTION file

Contents

Developed by Colin Fay, Vincent Guyader, Sébastien Rochette, Cervan Girard.
